meanings.definition: The act of mounting or the state of being mounted.
meanings.sent1: The mountings of the artwork were carefully done to ensure they stayed secure.
meanings.sent2: She admired the mountings of the butterflies in the display case.
meanings.sent3: The mountings of the trophies on the wall made the room look impressive.
meanings.sent4: The mountings of responsibilities on his shoulders felt overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The intricate mountings of the jewelry caught the light beautifully.

meanings.definition: A frame or setting in which a gem is set.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler crafted delicate mountings for the precious stones.
meanings.sent2: She chose a simple mounting for her engagement ring.
meanings.sent3: The mounting of the diamond in the ring sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The mounting of the gem resembled a tiny crown on her finger.
meanings.sent5: The intricate mounting enhanced the beauty of the gemstone.

meanings.definition: The process of preparing and arranging a specimen for display.
meanings.sent1: The mountings of the butterflies in the exhibit were expertly done.
meanings.sent2: He learned the art of mounting insects for the museum display.
meanings.sent3: The mounting of the rare bird for the exhibit was a delicate task.
meanings.sent4: The mounting of the fossils in the museum showcased their beauty.
meanings.sent5: The careful mounting of the flowers preserved their natural beauty.
